DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , open-label , single-dose evaluation 1 mg UT-15C SR pharmacokinetics , safety , tolerability subject normal , mild , moderate end stage renal disease ( ESRD ; dialysis ) . Subjects ESRD group receive 2 dos UT-15C SR , separate 14 day . One dose give 4 hour prior dialysis , dose give end dialysis . Pharmacokinetic sample take immediately prior dose 0.5 , 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 , 6 , 8 , 10 , 12 , 14 , 16 , 18 , 20 , 24 , 30 , 36 , 42 48 hour post dose . Additionally , subject ESRD sample take 60 hrs post dose .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Renal Impairment Pharmacokinetics Oral Treprostinil
DOC.criteria: Male female volunteer ESRD ( require dialysis ) , moderate ( creatinine clearance ; CrCL = 3050 mL/min ) , mild ( CrCL = 5080 mL/min ) normal renal function ( control group ; ( CrCL > 80 mL/min ) ) may enrol . Eligible subject 1879 year age BMI 18 40 kg/m2 take chronic nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs )
